description: Complete system overview documenting the campaign-based lead tracking and verification system, including core architecture, key components, and high-level data flows
Detailed documentation of the core data models (Campaigns, Leads, Visits, Verifications) and their relationships, including tracking mechanisms and deduplication logic
Documentation of the IP-based lead tracking algorithms, including visit attribution, conversion funnel progression, and unique visitor counting logic
Detailed documentation of the multi-stage payment verification flow, including card validation, 3D Secure simulation, and verification state management
Documentation of campaign analytics calculations, including unique visitor counting, conversion rate formulas, and aggregation of statistics across campaigns
